text:
Even if an Applicant meets all of the eligibility criteria in this 
Chapter 66A, the Loan Committee may, in its discretion, choose not to approve any proposed Seismic Safety Loan or to approve any Seismic Safety Loan for less than the amount requested by the Applicant. 
(Formerly Sec. 66A.15; added by Ord. 100-94, App. 3/11/94; amended and renumbered by Ord. 2-01, File No. 001969, App. 1/12/2001)
(Former Sec. 66A.14 was renumbered as Sec. 66A.13 by Ord. 2-01.)
